rows.label: bf08160100_0020
rows.name:
It's the aftermath of the battle 
between the Heaven's Holy Grails

rows.label: bf08160100_0060
rows.name: This is the womb of Iira's Divine Beast.

rows.label: bf08160100_0070
rows.name:
Even in ancient Iira, only a select few 
knew this place existed.

rows.label: bf08160100_0080
rows.name: To think such a place existed...

rows.label: bf08160100_0090
rows.name: So this is...The Divine Beast's womb...

rows.label: bf08160100_0130
rows.name: But they also look like Divine Beasts...

rows.label: bf08160100_0140
rows.name:
These are Blades that failed during their 
transformation into Divine Beasts.

rows.label: bf08160100_0150
rows.name: Divine Beasts create Core Crystals inside their bodies.

rows.label: bf08160100_0160
rows.name: You all should have seen it at least once.
